channel.title: Stainless Steel Cable Tie on Herfom
channel.description: Recent content in Stainless Steel Cable Tie on Herfom

item.title: 201/304/316 Stainless Steel Cable Tie
item.description: Detail Material: 201 / 304 / 316 Stainless Steel Structure: Self locking, ball bearing mechanism for quick and easy installation, either by hand. Working temperature: -80℃-500℃ Length: All lengths are available Feature: High tensile strength Rust proof Non-flammability Anti corrosion High resistance to acetic acid,alkali acid,sulphuric acid, corrode etc Usage: First, the cable is bundled in a stainless steel cable tie. Next, the tail of the stainless steel band is clamped by the tool.

item.title: Plastic Spray/Coated Stainless Steel Cable Tie
item.description: Introduction Material: 201 / 304 / 316 Stainless Steel & Epoxy Structure: Self locking, ball bearing mechanism for quick and easy installation, either by hand. Working temperature: -40℃-100℃ (Excessive temperature causes the outermost plastic to melt) Length: All lengths are available Feature: High tensile strength Rust proof Non-flammability Anti corrosion High resistance to acetic acid,alkali acid,sulphuric acid, corrode etc Usage:
